title: Accepting Change & Seeking Help
description:
Welcome back to the In the Crease Podcast with Linda Cohn and Emily Kaplan! We start off today's episode with news from Buffalo regarding their now former captain Jack Eichel. Then, Linda shares an update on Evander Kane before Emily starts a discussion on vaccinated NHL players. After that, we hear from LA Kings' Drew Doughty who shares his experience with therapy, eating junk food on off days, how team bonding has changed over the years, and more!
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Linda Cohn, Emily Kaplan
itunes:subtitle: Linda Cohn and Emily Kaplan talk to Drew Doughty about therapy, being a captain, team bonding, and more!
